level.heading: NOTICE OF RETURN TO WORK (ยง 7-138)

level.text: 138.1 In all cases reported to the Program, the official superior shall beequired to notify the Program immediately when the claimant returns to work orhen the injury ceases.
138.2 The official superior shall notify the Program if, after the claimanteturns to work, the same injury causes the claimant to stop work again.
